This is an issue with the new progress items - the refresh is called using

  final Display display= Display.getDefault();

Which can still be non-null even though the workbench is shutting down.

What is happening here is that PlatformUI.isWorkbenchRunning() needs to be 
called first - otherwise it could potentially get destroyed as shutdown occurs 
as this is being done in an asyncExec.
